verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: used] to criticize former President Barack Obama for his heavy use of executive power , but has embraced it since taking office .

President Donald Trump used to criticize former President Barack Obama for his heavy use of executive power , but [V: has] embraced it since taking office .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] used to criticize former President Barack Obama for his heavy use of executive power , but has [V: embraced] [ARG1: it] [ARGM-TMP: since taking office] .
